text: 3. Consider the equation, ay —ay—y? dt y—vy, (a) Again consider the cases a < 0, a = 0, and a > 0. In each case find the critical points, draw the phase line, and determine whether each critical point is asymptotically stable, metastable(semi-stable)!, or unstable. (b) In each case sketch the direction field and several solutions of the equation in the ty-plane.
